headline: AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
shortBio: AI engineer and full-stack developer focused on building practical, real-world applications using modern web technologies, backend systems, and artificial intelligence.

children.text: I’m an AI engineer and full-stack developer with hands-on experience building intelligent systems, mobile applications, and scalable backend solutions. My interest in technology comes from solving real-world problems using a mix of software engineering and artificial intelligence.

: I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and building systems that are practical, scalable, and easy to extend. I enjoy working across the stack — from frontend interfaces to backend APIs and AI logic — and I learn best by building and shipping real products.

: I work with technologies like React, Next.js, React Native, FastAPI, Supabase, and AI models to build full-stack and AI-driven applications. I’ve built systems such as AI chatbots, attendance solutions, and production-ready web platforms through internships, hackathons, and open-source programs.
Outside of development, I actively participate in hackathons, mentor open-source contributors, attend tech meetups, and enjoy learning about emerging trends in AI and software engineering.
